member.name: M:CMS.Synchronization.AbstractIntegrationConnector.SetProcessingInternalTasks
member.summary: Sets the flag to true, if not already set and returns a value indicating whether the flag was set by the current call. To ensure mutual exclusion, only the thread successfully setting the flag can process internal tasks.
member.returns: Returns true if the flag was set by the current call.

member.name: M:CMS.Synchronization.AbstractIntegrationConnector.ClearProcessingInternalTasks
member.summary: Clears the ""/> flag. The flag can be cleared only after it has been previously set by a call.
member.exception: Thrown when clearing an already clear flag. Such exception indicates possible multi-threaded access and violation of the mutual exclusion.

member.name: M:CMS.Synchronization.AbstractIntegrationConnector.SetProcessingExternalTasks
member.summary: Sets the flag to true, if not already set and returns a value indicating whether the flag was set by the current call. To ensure mutual exclusion, only the thread successfully setting the flag can process internal tasks.
member.returns: Returns true if the flag was set by the current call.

member.name: M:CMS.Synchronization.AbstractIntegrationConnector.ClearProcessingExternalTasks
member.summary: Clears the ""/> flag. The flag can be cleared only after it has been previously set by a call.
member.exception: Thrown when clearing an already clear flag. Such exception indicates possible multi-threaded access and violation of the mutual exclusion.

member.name: T:CMS.Synchronization.IntegrationProcessResultEnum
member.summary: Enumeration indicationg processing result. Task the value says whether the 3rd party system processed the task well or not. See comments for each value.

member.name: F:CMS.Synchronization.IntegrationProcessResultEnum.OK
member.summary: OUTBOUND TASKS - Default state of the task. Says that task was processed without any error and should be deleted (or the relation should be deleted).

member.name: F:CMS.Synchronization.IntegrationProcessResultEnum.Error
member.summary: OUTBOUND TASKS - The result indicating that the processing of the task failed and should not continue. - SYNC TASKS - Synchronization does not continue for other connectors.

member.name: F:CMS.Synchronization.IntegrationProcessResultEnum.ErrorAndSkip
member.summary: OUTBOUND TASKS - The result indicating that the processing of the task ended with error but should continue. - SYNC TASKS - Synchronization does continue for other connectors.

member.name: F:CMS.Synchronization.IntegrationProcessResultEnum.SkipNow
member.summary: OUTBOUND TASKS - The result indicating that the task was not processed and should be processed later. The task should remain in database with its current state.

member.name: T:CMS.Synchronization.IntegrationProcessTypeEnum
member.summary: Says how the CMS should process the task. See comments for each value.

member.name: F:CMS.Synchronization.IntegrationProcessTypeEnum.Default
member.summary: Processes the task immediately. If error occurs, the processing stops and sets the type to Error.

member.name: F:CMS.Synchronization.IntegrationProcessTypeEnum.SkipOnce
member.summary: Does not process the task during first processing (just sets the type to Default so it is going to be processed during next processing).

member.name: F:CMS.Synchronization.IntegrationProcessTypeEnum.SkipOnError
member.summary: Processes the task immediately. If error occurs, it skips the task and continues with processing.

member.name: F:CMS.Synchronization.IntegrationProcessTypeEnum.DeleteOnError
member.summary: Processes the task immediately. If error occurs, deletes the task and continues with processing.

member.name: F:CMS.Synchronization.IntegrationProcessTypeEnum.Error
member.summary: Says that processing should not continue due to critical error.

member.name: T:CMS.Synchronization.TaskDataTypeEnum
member.summary: Type of data contained in task to process.

member.name: F:CMS.Synchronization.TaskDataTypeEnum.Simple
member.summary: Just main object.

member.name: F:CMS.Synchronization.TaskDataTypeEnum.SimpleSnapshot
member.summary: Main object with translation information.

member.name: F:CMS.Synchronization.TaskDataTypeEnum.Snapshot
member.summary: Object with child objects and bindings.

member.name: T:CMS.Synchronization.TaskProcessTypeEnum
member.summary: Type of processing integration tasks. Determines whether the tasks are being processed asynchronously or synchronously with full or partial data. The types are ordered by priority (highest to lowest).

member.name: F:CMS.Synchronization.TaskProcessTypeEnum.SyncSnapshot
member.summary: Synchronous processing with complete object/document data (child objects etc.) Runs in context of the application allowing retrieving any additional data. This type is the first priority during processing.

member.name: F:CMS.Synchronization.TaskProcessTypeEnum.AsyncSnapshot
member.summary: Asynchronous processing with complete object/document data (child objects etc.) including all translations. This type is the second priority during processing.

member.name: F:CMS.Synchronization.TaskProcessTypeEnum.AsyncSimpleSnapshot
member.summary: Asynchronous processing with data of object/document itself (including its translations). This type is the third priority during processing.

member.name: F:CMS.Synchronization.TaskProcessTypeEnum.AsyncSimple
member.summary: Asynchronous processing with data of object/document itself (without any translations). This type is the fourth priority during processing.
